name: Mailroom (Gavin Ceballos)
description:
In this short game for The Mundane Jam, you get to sort some mail.

This was fun to make, but I definitely did not give myself the time I should have.

Controls:

  • Click on mail to pick it up
  • Click and Drag mail around with the mouse
  • Use onscreen buttons

In first person sections:

  • Use WASD to move around.
  • Mouse to look.
  • Click to interact when crosshair appears
    • Move closer to objects if the cross hair doesn't appear
